com.googlecode.aluminumproject.finders

Interface TypeFinder

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ConfigurationElement
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultTypeFinder

    public interface TypeFinder
extends ConfigurationElement
    Finds types in the class path, based on a filter.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  TypeFinder.TypeFilter
      The filter used by the find method.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      List<Class<?>> find(TypeFinder.TypeFilter filter, String... packageNames)
      Finds types matching a certain filter in a number of packages.

      • Methods inherited from interface com.googlecode.aluminumproject.configuration.ConfigurationElement

        disable, initialise

    • Method Detail

      • find

        List<Class<?>> find(TypeFinder.TypeFilter filter,
                  String... packageNames)
                    throws AluminumException
        Finds types matching a certain filter in a number of packages.
        Parameters:
        filter - the filter to apply
        packageNames - the names of the packages to include in the search (subpackages will be included)
        Returns:
        a list with all types in the given packages that match the given filter (may be empty)
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - when no package names are supplied
        AluminumException - when something goes wrong while trying to find matching types
